page.title: 11NOTABLE BUILDINGS
page.content: {THE RECTORY}was sold when Astley became part of The United Benefice. It is interesting to speculate whether the{RECTORY GHOST}allowed himself to be sold with the house!{ { { MR.P. DINGLEY,}a former Astley headmaster and churchwarden, told me that the Rector in charge about 10 years ago, saw the figure of a monk in a passage and that he, himself, stayed at the Rectory prior to taking up his appointment at Astley School. As he settled for the night after switching off the light, he felt something brush across his face, though nothing was to be seen when he switched the light on again.A sliding kitchen door and cupboard doors also close on their own.
